content: color-me-texture cowl materials fingering weight #1 yarn or dk weight #3 40g main color mc 10-12g contrast color 1 cc1 10-12g contrast color 2 cc2 or stash bust and use minis and leftovers for each section fingering us 4/3 5mm circular needles 22 needles in the round or 32 + for magic or traveling loop dk us 6/4mm circular needles 22 needles in the round or 32 + for magic or traveling loop stitch marker for beginning of round bor glossary tapestry needle k knit p purl bor beginning of round gauge r round mc main color 20 stitches/4 10cm cc1 contrasting color 1 gauge for this pattern is not crucial which is why you cc2 contrasting color 2 can use fingering/sock or dk weight pm place marker m marker k2tog knit 2 together finished measurements yo yarn over ssk slip 1 stitch knit-wise slip 1 purl- 12 x 15 flat wise put both stitches onto the left needle and knit together through the back loop cast on sl slip 1 stitch purl-wise slwyif slip 1 purl-wise with yarn in using mc cast on 144* stitches using a german front twisted cast on or your favorite stretchy cast on rm remove marker *if you prefer a wider cowl add cast on stitches in kfb knit front without removing stitch increments of 24 from left needle knit back leg of join round careful not to twist stitches pm bor the same stitch +1 p2tog purl 2 together color-me-texture cowl sewroyal co 1 ribbing mc zig zag mc r1 k2 p2 repeat to end of row set up k round repeat r1 till ribbing measures 1 r1 p3 sl repeat to end of round r2 k3 sl repeat to end of round r3 p3 sl repeat to end of round stripes cc1 mc r4 sl 3 stitches to a cable needle in back knit the next stitch slip 3 cc1 k round stitches back to the left needle and mc k round knit repeat to end of round cc1 k 3 rounds r5 sl p3 repeat to end of round mc k round r6 sl k3 repeat to end of round cc1 k round r7 sl p3 repeat to end of round r8 sl 1 stitch to cable needle in front twisted mesh mc knit the next 3 stitches slip 1 stitch back to the left needle and knit setup k round repeat to end of round r1 k2tog yo repeat to end of round r9 p3 sl repeat to end of round r2 k round r10 k3 sl repeat to end of round r3-r6 repeat r1-r2 2 more times r11 p3 sl repeat to end of round r12 sl 3 stitches to a cable needle in staggered andalusian cc2 back knit the next stitch slip 3 stitches back to the left needle and r1 k round knit repeat to end of round r2 k5 p1 repeat to end of round r3 k round stockinette mc r4 k2 p1 k3 repeat to
